data.name: Carnal Instinct
data.detailed_description:
Carnal Instinct is an Adult RPG with an emphasis on AAA quality visuals and compelling erotic interaction. The Steam version of the game is the most stable, and gets consistent updates, including huge content updates at least four times per year (approximately once per quarter, precise release timings will vary depending on update complexity). For full details of the most recent update please check the news section.

Our journey begins in a realm of ancient myth, where the life-giving waters of the Euphoris river meet the sand-swept ruins of Sabu. The God-Queen Kethra has not been seen for a thousand years, but rumors of her return are uttered in hushed tones throughout the sprawling villages along the shoreline of the once mighty waterway. Deprived of its divine empress, Sabu has fallen under the rule of demigods, powerful beings that once served Kethra as bodyguards. Unchecked, these immortals now vie for power as warlords, their conquest bathing Sabu with the blood of the innocent.

You enter this world as a slave, a prisoner of fate and the cruelty of others, but you will find that your future is as changeable as the sands of Sabu. The path of fate is yours to tread and your story is not yet written...

The game currently features playable Human, Feline, Jackal, Crocodilian, and Draconic races on the first steps of their ascent to godhood; living echoes of the deities themselves. As your power increases and development of the project continues, so too will you be able to shape your body - from one which retains the majority of your once-human form, to the humanoid animal deities that ruled Sabu in centuries past, or finally adopt the truly primal presence of the ancient gods (Centaur, Naga, Sphynx, and more). Male, Female, and Futa options are all available in-game.

Customisation extends beyond skins and species, with all manner of sliders allowing customisation of many facets of your character's form...

Our erotic content spans the tame foothills of vanilla lovemaking, all the way to the depraved peaks of the most extreme carnal desires. Our adult features are more than mere titillation or something to while away the hours, sex links directly into quests and vice versa. Want to improve relations or recruit an NPC to join your camp? Bending over or kneeling down might get them exactly where you want them to be. As you begin to bend Sabu to your will so you will draw attention from those who wish to submit to your lust, or tame you to indulge their own.

Carnal Instinct contains Anthro and Human content, catering to a wide range of preferences and desires. You can enable and disable sexual content to meet your taste, nothing is mandatory and you can choose who you decide to be intimate with and on what terms. The form into which you shape your body will dictate what options are open to you, with the more exotic forms allowing more niche sexual opportunities...

Unsure how to get the latest content? Opt-in to the public beta branch and download the most up-to-date build available.

data.short_description: Carnal Instinct is an Adult RPG with an emphasis on AAA quality visuals and compelling erotic interaction. You enter the world of Sabu a slave, but will forge your own destiny and shape the world itself in this realm of ancient gods, mythical creatures, and boundless lust.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: 64-bit Windows 10
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • 内存: 16 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX 版本: 12
  • 存储空间: 需要 10 GB 可用空间
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • 操作系统: 64-bit Windows 10
  • 处理器: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • 内存: 16 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX 版本: 12
  • 存储空间: 需要 10 GB 可用空间

content_descriptors.notes:
The narrative includes themes of a sexual nature including master/slave, suggestive content, and exploration of dark desires.

Violence in the game is limited, however combat does involve melee and ranged fighting (including blood).

Carnal Instinct contains frequent depictions of sex acts including but not limited to fetish content, master/slave BSDM, gratuitous nudity, futanari, huge insertions, bodily fluids, consensual "non-consensual roleplay" (disabled in menu by default), and more.
